metadata.name: Cold Steel
metadata.description:
We have been trying to retreat into the wilds as much as possible. Our infrared detectors have been working like a charm, we've had a couple close calls, but our escape has been fairly successful thanks to those. The biggest limitation on our hands right now is the rudimentary level of technology available at our disposal, since using any piece of tech that has AI of any level could very well be a death sentence.

What we need to do, and how long we survive is now up for debate. I hope this message reaches the High Command of the resistance before we're terminated. May Yaldaboath guide us all.
Camp Captain out.

Read The Full Story Here:
https://bit.ly/coldsteelcv
